item.title: CVE-2024-25924|2024-06-04T17:35:39.985Z -- trustindex.io -- wp%20testimonials
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in Trustindex.Io WP Testimonials.This issue affects WP Testimonials: from n/a through 1.4.3.
